A lightweight feature prioritization and planning tool for product teams.

## Project Details

FeatureForge is a comprehensive feature prioritization and planning tool designed specifically for product teams. Built with modern web technologies, it provides an intuitive interface for managing product roadmaps, prioritizing features based on various criteria, and facilitating team collaboration throughout the product development lifecycle.

The application leverages React for a responsive user interface, Node.js and Express for a robust backend API, PostgreSQL for reliable data storage, and Resend for seamless email communications and notifications.

## Key Features

- **Feature Prioritization Matrix**: Advanced scoring system with customizable criteria including business value, technical complexity, and user impact
- **Interactive Roadmap Planning**: Drag-and-drop interface for organizing features across quarters and releases
- **Team Collaboration Tools**: Real-time commenting, voting, and feedback collection on proposed features
- **Data-Driven Insights**: Analytics dashboard showing feature performance metrics and team productivity
- **Integration Capabilities**: APIs for connecting with popular project management tools like Jira, Trello, and Asana
- **Customizable Workflows**: Flexible approval processes and status tracking tailored to your team's needs
- **Automated Notifications**: Smart email alerts for deadline reminders, status changes, and team updates

A personal website to host my projects and any thoughts I think others might be interested in.

## Project Details

This personal website serves as a digital portfolio and blog, showcasing my coding projects and sharing insights from my development journey. Built with Astro for optimal performance, the site leverages static generation for lightning-fast load times while incorporating React components for interactive elements.

The design emphasizes clean typography, responsive layouts, and accessibility, following modern web development best practices. The site features a project showcase, blog functionality, and is optimized for both light and dark themes.

## Key Features

- **Project Showcase**: Comprehensive display of coding projects with detailed descriptions and technology stacks
- **Performance Optimized**: Static site generation with Astro delivers excellent Core Web Vitals scores
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach ensuring great experience across all device sizes
- **Dark Mode Support**: Seamless theme switching with system preference detection
- **Blog Integration**: Markdown-based content management system for sharing development insights
- **SEO Optimized**: Proper meta tags, structured data, and semantic HTML for search engine visibility
- **Accessibility First**: WCAG compliant with proper ARIA labels and keyboard navigation
- **Developer Experience**: TypeScript throughout, ESLint/Prettier configuration, and hot module reloading
